name: mt_MAT_00_Extract_PRDCT_MSTR
description: @connectionSource= MDM Hosted, @connectionTarget= S3 Bucket, @transformation= Read MSTR table from MDM and write in S3 Bucket, @dataType= MSTR table, @sources=[@connection1= ORC_HMDM_READ_MATERIALS], @targets=[@connection1= S3_HMDM_V2_HostedAgent], @description= Mapping task for DL Extract

parameters.name: $Src_MDM_S3$
parameters.label: Conn_MDM (Conn_MDM)
parameters.customQuery:
SELECT
xref.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY,
mstr.MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER,
mstr.OVRLL_MTRL_TYP AS OVERALL_ITEM_TYPE,
mstr.MTRL_TYP AS ITEM_TYPE,
mstr.CHAMP_CD AS CHAMP_CODE,
mstr.PRDCT_CTGR AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY,
mstr.TCHNLG_GRP AS TECHNOLOGY_GROUP,
mstr.PRDCT_HRCHY AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY,
mstr.PRDCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE,
mstr.BS_UNT_MSR AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEASURE,
mstr.DVSN AS BU,
mstr.SBU_DVSN AS SBU,
mstr.STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS,
mstr.ORGNTNG_ID AS ORIGINATING_IDENTIFIER,
mstr.SRC_SYSTM_ID AS ORIGINATING_SYSTEM,
mstr.NW_PRDCT_LNCH_DT AS NEW_PRODUCT_LAUNCH_DATE,
mstr.ITM_EXST_SRC AS ITEM_EXISTS_IN_SOURCE,
mstr.CREATOR,
to_Char(mstr.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as CREATE_DATE,
mstr.UPDATED_BY,
to_Char(mstr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as LAST_UPDATE_DATE
FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR mstr
INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF xref ON MSTR.ROWID_OBJECT  = xref.ROWID_OBJECT  AND mstr.SRC_SYSTM_ID  = xref.SRC_SYSTM_ID
WHERE xref.ROWID_SYSTEM <> 'SYS0'

inOutParameters.name: p_Src_MDM
inOutParameters.currentValue: SELECT xref.PKEY_SRC_OBJECT AS ITEM_SKEY, mstr.MTRL_IDNTFR AS PRODUCT_IDENTIFIER, mstr.OVRLL_MTRL_TYP AS OVERALL_ITEM_TYPE, mstr.MTRL_TYP AS ITEM_TYPE, mstr.CHAMP_CD AS CHAMP_CODE, mstr.PRDCT_CTGR AS PRODUCT_CATEGORY, mstr.TCHNLG_GRP AS TECHNOLOGY_GROUP, mstr.PRDCT_HRCHY AS PRODUCT_HIERARCHY, mstr.PRDCT_TYPE AS PRODUCT_TYPE, mstr.BS_UNT_MSR AS BASE_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, mstr.DVSN AS BU, mstr.SBU_DVSN AS SBU, mstr.STATUS_CD AS PRODUCT_STATUS, mstr.ORGNTNG_ID AS ORIGINATING_IDENTIFIER, mstr.SRC_SYSTM_ID AS ORIGINATING_SYSTEM, mstr.NW_PRDCT_LNCH_DT AS NEW_PRODUCT_LAUNCH_DATE, mstr.ITM_EXST_SRC AS ITEM_EXISTS_IN_SOURCE, mstr.CREATOR, to_Char(mstr.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as CREATE_DATE, mstr.UPDATED_BY, to_Char(mstr.LAST_UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS') as LAST_UPDATE_DATE FROM MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR mstr INNER JOIN MATERIALS_HUB.C_BO_PRDCT_MSTR_XREF xref ON MSTR.ROWID_OBJECT = xref.ROWID_OBJECT AND mstr.SRC_SYSTM_ID = xref.SRC_SYSTM_ID WHERE xref.ROWID_SYSTEM <> 'SYS0' AND mstr.last_update_date > TO_TIMESTAMP('29-05-25 00:00:00.000','DD-MM-YY HH24:MI.SSXFF')
